p: 3-Benzamido-2-fluoro-N-(4-(pentafluorothio)phenyl)benzamide ( 4a). This follows the general method. The residue was purified by column chromatography on a silica gel (Hexane:EtOAc = 10:1) to give the desired diamide 4a as a white solid (55.3 mg, 78% yield). mp 193~194 °C; 1H-NMR (500 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 8.63–8.57 (m, 1H), 8.44 (d, J = 12.4 Hz, 1H), 8.09 (s, 1H), 7.94–7.88 (m, 2H), 7.85–7.80 (m, 1H), 7.78 (s, 4H), 7.65–7.60 (m, 1H), 7.57–7.52 (m, 2H), 7.36 (t, J = 8.0 Hz, 1H); 13C-NMR (100 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 165.6, 161.3, 140.2, 133.9, 132.6, 129.1, 127.2, 127.1,127.0, 126.8, 126.4, 126.3, 125.5, 125.4, 121.3, 121.2, 119.6; 19F-NMR (470 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 84.83 (quin, 1F, J SF–SF4, J = 150.3 Hz, SF), 63.41 (d, 4F, J SF4–SF, J = 149.8 Hz, SF 4), −131.28–−131.40 (m, 1F); HRMS (EI) calcd. for C 20H 14F 6N 2O 2S 460.0680, found 460.0680 (see Supplementary Materials).
